With the new 15-inch MacBook Air - more space for your favorite things thanks to the large Liquid Retina display Equipped with a productive M2 chip that increases battery life up to 18 hours, the New MacBook Air is lightning-fast performance in an ultraportable design.

product.title: JBL Clip 4 Eco Blue
product.description: JBL GO 3 is a new generation of ultra-portable speaker that combines the legendary JBL brand sound and bright modern design. It was created for those who do not want to part with their favorite music even for a second, and therefore has the most compact form factor, a waterproof case with protection against dust and moisture and a large battery. On a walk or during cycling, by the pool or on the beach - let your favorite music accompany you everywhere.

product.title: Apple AirPods Pro 2 Case
product.description: Apple provides an opportunity to restore lost components for less than half the cost of a new gadget. Few companies will provide you with such a service, because the loss of a gadget is not the reason for a bad gadget! And so you can restore your Apple AirPods, in this case the charging case.
